title: Deep Learning With The Elephants
description: Elephants are in danger. Counting them is crucial to saving them. But they're hard to see in the rainforest. So scientists are enlisting the help of AI technology.
copyright: Copyright 2015-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: Deep Learning With The Elephants
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: Counting elephants is key to saving them. But in the rainforest, they're hard to spot. One scientist is listening for them instead, with the help of artificial intelligence.
itunes:subtitle: Counting elephants is key to saving them. But in the rainforest, they're hard to spot. One scientist is listening for them instead, with the help of artificial intelligence.
content:encoded: Elephants are in danger. Counting them is crucial to saving them. But they're hard to see in the rainforest. So scientists are enlisting the help of AI technology.
